attributes.title: 2022 Renault Koleos 2.5 Dynamique Auto

attributes.description: Sensual lines, dynamic profile, sculpted sides and assertive presence. From the first look, CLIO attracts you with its dynamic and desirable style. With its tidy finishes, it combines modernity and robustness: C-shaped brand light, full LED lighting, finely integrated chrome finishes and the elegantly concealed rear door handles. On the interior, every detail counts. CLIO has undergone a revolution and is offering quality materials and finishes. With its new high-tech, driver-orientated cockpit, its cocooning seats and the MULTI-SENSE customizable ambient lighting, enjoy a driving experience which will awake your senses. Settle in to the future at the wheel of CLIO, and stay ahead: large multimedia 9.3” touchscreen*, customizable driver screen and electronic parking brake. The CLIO is equipped with a new 74kW Turbo engine that offers top-level performance whilst ensuring economical fuel consumption. Thanks to its dynamic chassis, and its direct and precise steering, you are guaranteed a more intuitive driving experience. The driver will not be the only one smiling on board: the suspension and soundproofing have been improved for everyone’s comfort. Finally, the audio system with its 6 speakers* offers a rich and immersive musical experience.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 4 750.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 26 980.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.

attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager JP Thomas and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Select Vanderbijlpark.
